product_name: Burley Honey Bee Bike Trailer with Stroller Kit - Double
long_description: With room to seat 2 kids, this versatile bike trailer includes a stroller kit so you can tow it to your destination, detach it from your bike, then simply flip down the stroller wheel and stroll away!
short_description: With room to seat 2 kids, this versatile bike trailer includes a stroller kit so you can tow it to your destination, detach it from your bike, then simply flip down the stroller wheel and stroll away!
